page.title: 14DEVIZES SPORTING FACILITIES.
page.content: Devizes Sports Club was formed in the 1950's when the tennis,cricket and rugby clubs came together at one site in the Town. Facilities there are good,with a rugby and cricket pitch and 5 tennis courts together with two club houses containing showers,bar and social areas. Devizes Ladies Hockey Club also use the sports club as a base.All the sports have junior sections which coach and encourage future members of the senior teams. Other sporting enthusiasts at Devizes rely mainly on the use of facilities at the school sports centre where weight lifting,5-a-side football,table tennis and badminton take place. There is a bowling club in Devizes with two greens providing twelve rinks for play.
